CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 18, 1950, pg. 24. Portion of accompanying article reads: "Helen James Returns on Friday To Continental Bar in Grill No. 1.  Best news to hit Pittsburghers since they received the income tax refunds is the fascinating fact that Helen James will return to the Continental Bar in Crawford Grill Number One, opening Friday, March 17, for an indefinite stand..."
TitMainTitle: Helen James standing next to sign reading "Good News! Opening Friday March 17 by Popular Demand, Helen James, Pittsburgh's Romantic Soprano, in the Continental Bar, plus Spurgeon Illery's..." at Crawford Grill No. 1
